PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06792020-09-25,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  PPA, 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pacific Pilotage Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PACIFIC PILOTAGE REGULATIONS in order to (1) facilitate pilot recruitment in light of an anticipated increase in demand for pilotage services; and (2) reduce the likelihood of safety-related incidents caused by waiver holders as they navigate compulsory pilotage waters.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0211 Publication Date: 2020-10-14
